title: Autumn In My Heart
resume: A Thai remake of the Korean Drama of the same name made in the year 2000. This follows a similar plot, there were two girls who were born in October. They had same birthday and were raised in the same village and in the same class. The story goes on and entwines the lives of these two characters within a tale of love and drama.
